mapper.select: SELECT c.mylecnum, c.usernum, c.lecdenum, c.payok, b.price, a.lectypea, a.lectypeb, a.lecname, a.teaname, b.roomnum, b.lectime, b.lecday, b.lecmonth, b.lecyear from lecture a, lecdetail b, mylecture c where a.lecnum=b.lecnum and b.lecdenum=c.lecdenum and c.usernum=#{usernum} and c.payok=#{payok}

SELECT c.mylecnum, c.usernum, c.lecdenum, c.payok, c.paytime, b.price, a.lectypea, a.lectypeb, a.lecname, a.teaname, b.roomnum, b.lectime, b.lecday, b.lecmonth, b.lecyear from lecture a, lecdetail b, mylecture c where a.lecnum=b.lecnum and b.lecdenum=c.lecdenum and c.usernum=#{usernum} and (c.payok='ok' or c.payok='cancel')
